position.marginalia_text: Contra vetere[m] et co[mmun]em ratione[m] partiendi domos:

marginalia.translation: Against the traditional and common computation of dividing the houses.

position.marginalia_text: Nam lic[et] cor coeli sit maxi[ma]e fortudinis, tamen decima domus suu[m] semp[e]r significatu[m]

marginalia.translation: For although midheaven is of the greatest valor, nevertheless the tenth house always ought to obtain its designation.

marginalia.anchor_text: ascendente medietate; in descendente; verum quod inductio fuerat posterioris
marginalia.translation: The threefold consideration of the direction..
Why more in the western part?

marginalia.anchor_text: In particularibus autem Firmico indulget, ob bonorum autorum inopiam: uerum tantum ille abest à ueritate, quantum ab errore Ptolemaeus
marginalia.translation: The excellence of Ptolemy above Firmicus.

marginalia.anchor_text: In particularibus autem Firmico indulget, ob bonorum autorum inopiam: uerum tantum ille abest à ueritate, quantum ab errore Ptolemaeus

position.marginalia_text: Maiorem commendationem metetur Ptolom[a]e[us] maiorem et firmicus.

marginalia.translation: Ptolemy deserves greater recommendation, greater even than Firmicus.

position.marginalia_text: Cum de anno sumus certi, qua r[ati]o[n]e scrutemur anni partem in qua eventus sese sit ostensurus.

marginalia.translation: As we are certain about the year, in which manner we explore the part of the year in which the event may be about to show itself.
